-  withTime 

Type Property# withTime

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
static var withTime: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/ISO8601DateFormatter/Options/withTime#Discussion)

The date representation includes the time. The format for time is `HH:mm:ss`.

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/ISO8601DateFormatter/Options/withTime#see-also)
